verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:8
verses.text: I gathered me also silver and gold, and the peculiar treasure of kings and of the provinces: I gat me men singers and women singers, and the delights of the sons of men, as musical instruments, and that of all sorts.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:9
verses.text: So I was great, and increased more than all that were before me in Jerusalem: also my wisdom remained with me.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:10
verses.text: And whatsoever mine eyes desired I kept not from them, I withheld not my heart from any joy; for my heart rejoiced in all my labour: and this was my portion of all my labour.
